message: I propose a fair and simple split.  Let's get this over with quickly!
Let's be more equitable. I'm willing to split the money 60/40, with me taking the larger share since I'm the one who has to deal with the inflation.
Let's meet in the middle.  I'll take 60, you take 40, and we can end this game.  I don't think either of us wants to play for much longer.
